name: John King
occupation: im an Army attached with the united nation
description:
Hi, like I said in the head line I’m a fun loving person that is looking for that right person, I don’t lie and I don’t like being lied too, so if interested let me know.i can take tease and i love to tease back in short am a simple man with a very big heart
My ideal match would be someone that would care for me and be there for me, and wouldn’t lie to me about nothing, would love me unconditionally.
